name: Chinatsu Theft Auto
description:
In Development

Playing with guns and stealing cars. That's how CTA works. Start your gangster journey as "bottom q" and end it with being the "top g". Developed with Construct 3.

Controls;

CTRL - Spawn car

Q - Select weapon

W A S D - Move

Space *in car* - Handbrake

Space  - Dash

Restarts if you minimize the game tab or set focus to another thing on your OS.
